name: chitchatter
description: Chitchatter is a self-hosted, peer-to-peer chat client that works directly in the browser without servers. It uses WebRTC for secure and decentralized communications and requires no login or signup.
features: Peer-to-Peer Chat: Direct browser-to-browser communication. No servers needed.
WebRTC: Secure, encrypted connections using WebRTC. Private communication.
No Registration: Start chatting without accounts or signup. Instant access.
Decentralized: No central server stores your messages. True privacy.
Browser-Based: Works entirely in web browser. No installation.
Self-Hosted: Host your own signaling server. Complete control.
Open Source: Transparent, auditable code. Trust through verification.
